$WmMPID_アベル,ch01_16_Abel_M_Normal,Face|I betrayed my homeland, and Marth,
the moment Est was taken hostage.
I can never atone for that...$k$p$WmMPID_カイン,ch01_13_Kain_M_Normal,Face|I am no different. I failed to protect
King Cornelius, Marth's father. We've
no choice but to do all we can now.$k$p$Sbs1000|
